import React, { useContext, useRef } from 'react' import taskContext from '../context/TaskContext'; export default function UpdateModal(props) { const { modalTaskId, modalTaskDescription, setModalTaskDescription, modalTaskDueDate, setModalTaskDueDate } = props const context = useContext(taskContext); const { editTask } = context function handleClick() { editTask(modalTaskId, modalTaskDescription, modalTaskDueDate) } function onChange(e) { if (e.target.name === 'dueDate') { setModalTaskDueDate(new Date(e.target.value).toLocaleDateString()) } else { setModalTaskDescription(e.target.value) } } return (

Modal title

) }
